body:
Comment 1: 
As you can see, Go uses GetExitCodeProcess Windows API to retrieve process exit code
(http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms683189(v=vs.85).aspx). That
API parameter "lpExitCode" is defined as of "LPDWORD", which is "*uint32" in Go. As far
as I understand this Windows documentation, process exit code cannot be -1.

Alex
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
